tags.name: request-timings-panel
tags.description: An element to render a set of ARC HAR timings.

attributes.name: narrow
attributes.description: When set it renders mobile friendly view

properties.name: redirects
properties.description:
An array of HAR 1.2 timings object.
It describes a timings for any redirect occurrence during the request.
The list should should be ordered by the occurrence time.

properties.name: narrow
properties.description: When set it renders mobile friendly view

properties.name: hasRedirects
properties.description: Tests whether redirects list has been set

tags.name: request-timings
tags.description: An element to render request timings data according to the HAR 1.2 spec.

attributes.name: narrow
attributes.description: When set it renders mobile friendly view

properties.name: timings
properties.description: A timings object as described in HAR 1.2 spec.

properties.name: narrow
properties.description: When set it renders mobile friendly view
